title: Adds advanced Grep - Regex text searches, extra Right to Left features, Fixes transform bug
changes: Added `storyDirection`, `paragraphDirection`, `characterDirection` to `composer` to greatly enhance Right to Left support
Fixed bug `transform` `scale` bug on envelopes and group strokes and patterns

title: Adds Google Sheets and Fixes loader bug
changes: Fixed bug where the loading screen would not close
notes: Allows Darty-Ai to use public Google Sheets and private Google Sheets shared with a service account. See https://darty.ai/illustrator-meets-google-sheets/
